message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $130 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $130 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105.
